page.title: 18RECREATION ERDINGTON
page.content: Different family members have different leisure pursuits. All listed watching T.V. and many listed videos for watching hired films and pre-recorded material. Fathers liked football, some liked fishing and going to Wales on trips. Other fathers are keen photographers. The local pub is popular with both parents. Mothers had more home-centred pursuits like reading, knitting and sewing. Some went to Bingo. The family made visits to the country at week-ends. Young people liked cycling and playing near home as well as swimming and belonging to sports clubs e.g. Judo, Badminton and Football. All enjoyed music, mostly pop. Some belong to Brownie, Guide and Scout groups. Boys like computer games and many girls like Irish dancing. Grandparents like gardening.
